id.description: The unique identifier of that manga.

title.description: The display title of the manga whose scans are to be downloaded.

base_url.description: The fixed part of the URL of the website from which scans of that manga can be downloaded.

single_pages.description: A list of template URLs to append to the base URL. If a template fails to load, a new attempt to load an image using the next template will be made, until one is successful or all failed.

items.description: The last part of the URL pointing to a single page. This may contain special sequences of characters used to mark the position of chapter ($c) and page ($p) numbers.

double_pages.description: Same as 'single_page' but optimized for cases where the loaded image is a double-page, which is basically two pages in one.

items.description: The last part of the URL pointing to a double-page. This may contain special sequences of characters used to mark the position of chapters ($c) and page ($c, $c1, $c2) numbers.

start_page.description: The number of the first page for this source. Some sites starts at 0, while others may start at 1.
